JUDGES: András Sajó;Elisabeth Steiner;Françoise Tulkens;Guido Raimondi;Isabelle Berro-Lefèvre;Paulo Pinto De Albuquerque
TEXT: The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE . Currently , he is detained at FAC .

On DATE the NORP ORG finally convicted the applicant , a NORP citizen , of CARDINAL counts of aggravated murder and robbery for having strangled and robbed CARDINAL of his homosexual partners . It sentenced him to life imprisonment , with the earliest release on parole after DATE , and to a ban from NORP territory . The ban entailed that the applicant could involuntarily be transferred to GPE for the execution of his sentence .
On DATE the applicant was surrendered by the NORP authorities to their NORP counterpart .

On DATE the NORP GPE ORG established that the legal conditions for executing the sentence in a NORP prison were indeed met . On DATE it converted the applicant ’s sentence into life imprisonment under NORP law , with the earliest release on parole after DATE . On DATE ORG upheld this ruling ( service : DATE ) .
